name: Tales of the Dead (kvnelvn)
description:
Follow Skeley, Ghost, and Devil as they seek out treasure. The three enter a nightmare world, as their adventure takes them deeper into the depths of the Dark Forest. There, they’ll find the Castle where the treasure lies. In order to claim it, they’ll have to go through a series of obstacles, enemies, and bosses.

In Tales of the Dead, you'll have the choice of playing as each of the three characters. Each one has their own special ability that makes navigating The Dark Forest and the Castle a little easier. As you progress through the game, you'll encounter different enemies and environments. 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:
Devil: A/D to move; F to fire; [Space] to jump

Ghost: Left/Right Arrows to move; / to fire; Up Arrow to jump

Mr. Skeley: H/K to move; L to attack; U to jump

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Developers:

Kevin Ho

Dean Yang

Yeonseo Lee
